justification: Vendor 3 fully and explicitly addresses the requirement by providing 'a robust integration framework through Cloud 3' for 'seamless communication' and 'interoperable' Digital Twins across platforms. Supported standards (OPC UA, MQTT, REST, IEC 61499) and 'end-to-end data transformation, orchestration, and contextual synchronization' demonstrate strong integration capabilities. Security compliance is also spelled out.
